name: Remember, Apollo
description:
Created for Ludum Dare 46. In Remember, Apollo, you play as a hunter struggling to recount a critical moment in his recent past. Fling from memory to memory with your trusty bow, as Apollo relives that fateful day in challenging yet approachable action platforming akin to the likes of Angry Birds, Jump King and Celeste.

Controls are simple, just click and drag anywhere on the screen to pull on the bow and release to launch.

--

I made this game in just 48 hours. If you like the game, let me know! I'd be interested in releasing a similar title like this on Android and iOS one day.
